meta.job_title: Operational & Treasury Management Risk Officer, VP

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement risk control processes to improve internal systems and control risk.
Assist in the development of control activities and audit processes to identify, evaluate, and remediate operational risks.
Identify gaps in current processes and develop operational risk policies and standards for risk management.
Assist in the development and implementation of measurement processes for operational key risk and control indicators.
Track and monitor operating risk issues for all business units and report issues and mitigation strategies to senior management.
Assist business units and senior management to perform operational risk identification and assessments in all business lines.
Enhance the bank's payment risk monitoring program and conduct enhanced due diligence on merchants, partners, and clients.
Analyze data to identify trends/anomalies in customer behavior and investigate suspicious activity.
Assist management in audits and regulatory compliance requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, Accounting, or related field; Master’s Degree preferred.
